metadata.title: CVE-2016-4422 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
The pam_sm_authenticate function in pam_sshauth.c in libpam-sshauth mightallow context-dependent attackers to bypass authentication or gainprivileges via a system user account.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4422` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-sshauth - 0.3.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpam-sshauth package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.1-1ubuntu2').
